turns.content: An anime intro that describes a setting from a weirdly dark shonen about golfing in a universe where WW2 is colliding in a timestream with the year 3020

In a world where war and peace coexist,
Golfers take to the green with swords and armor.
Amidst the chaos of war,
They swing their clubs with precision and power.

In the year 3020,
The game of golf has evolved.
Now it's a battle for survival,
Where the strongest will be the last one standing.

With technology and magic at their disposal,
These golfers fight for dominance.
In this strange and twisted world,
Only the strongest will emerge victorious.

So grab your clubs and gear up,
It's time to take to the course.
For in this game of golf,
Only the strongest will survive.

Describe the 10 spin off anime and manga for this project

1. Golf in the year 3020: Origins - This spin-off anime explores the history and origins of the game of golf in the year 3020, including its evolution into a survival tournament and the creation of advanced technologies and magic.
2. Golf in the year 3020: The Elite - This spin-off manga follows a group of the most elite golfers in the year 3020, as they compete in high-stakes tournaments and face off against powerful opponents.
3. Golf in the year 3020: The Next Generation - This spin-off anime introduces a new cast of young golfers as they learn the ways of the game and strive to become the next champions of the year 3020.
4. Golf in the year 3020: Beyond the Green - This spin-off manga delves into the lives of the golfers outside of the tournaments, showcasing their personal struggles and triumphs.
5. Golf in the year 3020: The Dark Side - This spin-off anime explores the sinister side of the game, including corrupt officials and dangerous technologies that threaten the safety of the golfers.
6. Golf in the year 3020: The Women's Division - This spin-off manga focuses on the female golfers of the year 3020, as they compete against each other and challenge societal norms.
7. Golf in the year 3020: The Strange and Unusual - This spin-off anime showcases the bizarre and unusual aspects of the game, including supernatural elements and surreal landscapes.
8. Golf in the year 3020: The Global Championship - This spin-off manga follows the international golfers as they compete in the ultimate tournament, representing their countries and battling for the top prize.
9. Golf in the year 3020: The Ultimate Showdown - This spin-off anime culminates in a massive tournament where all of the strongest golfers must face off against each other in a battle for supremacy.
10. Golf in the year 3020: The Aftermath - This spin-off manga explores the aftermath of the tournament, as the winners must deal with the consequences of their victory and the losers must come to terms with their defeat.
Explain a multiplayer live service game based on said anime, it's plot and gameplay features

The multiplayer live service game, Golf in the year 3020: The Ultimate Showdown, is set in the world of the anime and follows the same concept of a survival golf tournament. Players can create their own golfer and customize their appearance, weapons, and abilities. They can then join online matches with other players and compete in various tournaments across different locations.

The game's story follows the events of the anime, with players starting off in the first gold tournament and progressing through each arc. As they compete in matches and defeat other players, they will unlock new abilities and equipment to enhance their golfer.

Some gameplay features include:

* Real-time multiplayer matches with up to 8 players
* Various game modes, including single player and team matches
* Customizable golfers with unique abilities and weapons
* A progression system that allows players to unlock new equipment and abilities
* Dynamic environments and obstacles that add challenges to the matches
* Boss battles against powerful enemies, including cybernetic Hitler
* Seasonal events and challenges with exclusive rewards.
Explain the history of the creation of it's anime, and how it was bought by a corrupt company decades later.

Golf in the year 3020: The Ultimate Showdown was originally created by a group of independent anime creators who were passionate about golf and science fiction. They spent years developing the concept and designing the characters and world. After much hard work and dedication, they finally released the anime to critical acclaim and gained a dedicated fan base.

However, decades later, the anime was bought by a corrupt company known for producing low-quality content and milking successful properties for profit. The company began to produce spin-offs and merchandise without the input or approval of the original creators, diluting the quality and integrity of the anime.

The original creators, now elderly and retired, were heartbroken to see their beloved creation being mishandled by the corrupt company. They tried to fight back, but ultimately had no power to stop the company's exploitation of their work.
